title: Safety Precautions: It shall be responsibility of the Owner/Developer and the respective professionals on record appointed by Owner/Developer, to ensure all the necessary safety measures are taken on site and its immediate surroundings, especially in regard to workmen engaged, as directed in part -7, Constructional Practices & Safety, National Building Code of India, as amended up to date
clause_text: Safety Precautions: It shall be responsibility of the Owner/Developer and the respective professionals on record appointed by Owner/Developer, to ensure all the necessary safety measures are taken on site and its immediate surroundings, especially in regard to workmen engaged, as directed in part -7, Constructional Practices & Safety, National Building Code of India, as amended up to date.
